ComicInfo.Summary:
Introducing... Beth and the Beths!: Beth uses Rick's portal gun to escape from Jerry's humdrum banality into a world where she is a member of a punk rock band made up of clones of herself.
A Nightmare on Rick Street: Is Morty in a coma, or has he been sent to a surrealist summer camp where dream-stealing aliens are stealing Earth-persons' dreams to power their civilization in the "Dream-verse"? Only Rick and Scary Terry (a cheap "Freddy-Krueger rip-off") know for sure... and even they can't agree on what's real.
